text: Club Brugge Koninklijke Voetbalvereniging (), also referred to as just Club Brugge is a football club from Bruges, Belgium. It was founded in 1891 and is one of the top clubs in Belgium. Its home ground is the Jan Breydel Stadium, which has a capacity of 29,472. ==References== Category:Belgian football clubs Category:Bruges Category:1891 establishments in Europe Category:1890s establishments in Belgium
title: Club Brugge K.V.
